name: Toothbrush Simulator
description:
As a dentist it is your duty to brush these peoples teeth. Even if they don't understand your mission. Catch them and brush their teeth before they can get away!

Controls:
Move with WASD or Arrow keys
Throw lasso in movement direction with Left Mousebutton

In brushing mode:
Brush away everything from their teeth by moving the brush with the mouse

Pause: Escape
